website_summaries.verdict: While you'll like this scale's practical features, you may also run into frustrating longevity issues.
pros: Some owners say they like the no-glass construction
Simple to use with a large display that is easy to see
Comes with batteries so it's ready to use right out of the box
cons: Accuracy tends to diminish over time
Some scales stopped working altogether within a few months of ownership

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an "all caps" kind of person, but you need to know that if you're gambling on this product, it's not returnable. The listing even says "100% Eatsmart satisfaction guarantee", but nope. not returnable. even under "item defective". as in: "our products suck, and you're stuck with it. sucks to suck." It reports different weights within seconds. Not accurate if you're trying to track weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: worked for awhile, then got goofy. not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: please, id like to love your product, but is it designed for obsolescence? It worked fairly well, although at times was totally unresponsive. what i find unacceptable,is that i bought it and 4 years later, its totally useless. i get on and off and on again and voila! i have lost 20 pounds. can we keep products out of the landfills by making sure they are built to last?
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lipinski

customer_reviews.title: Once upon a time, it was an accurate scale.
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this scale in 2015, it was great. Decently accurate and reliable. Three years later, I'm having to constantly zero it out and even then, it's extremely inaccurate to actual weight which renders it pretty much useless to me. Thought it might be batteries so I recharged them and used other batteries and had no success there either. Being that the warranty is for two years, not much I can do but buy a new scale. I'd have expected this to last longer than it has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a little over a year!
customer_reviews.text: The first 6-7 months the accuracy was on point. Then afterwards it started showing a +\- 8-10lbs difference from other scales. The rubber legs on the bottom look worn and maybe that’s the reason, but the scale is not used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ATLButterFly

customer_reviews.title: BROKE after only 3 weeks of normal use
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only 3 weeks of normal use. Replaced batteries and no change. Scale displays 0.0 lbs only. Was not exposed to any amount of water and was kept in a protected location while not in use. Was delivered 29 days ago and it says it is "This item isn't eligible for return." It also states, "Return window closed on Jan 31, 2017". Today is Jan 19, 2017
customer_reviews.author: steve5000

customer_reviews.title: One Wonderful Scale!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on a diet, and I weigh myself every single morning (whether I want to or not!). I ordered this scale when I began the diet, and it has been most helpful in keeping me on track with my food, my hydration, and my exercise, all important elements of the diet. No, I won’t be on the diet forever, but I will need to keep up with my weight for the rest of my life, and I believe this terrific scale will see me through that. I definitely recommend this practically perfect scale, because it is the right size, it is portable, it is accurate, and its numbers are easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Belphoebe

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would work but EVERY time I or my husband went on the scale we got different weights. One time I would way 3 pounds heavier than the next. Wanted to use this for my new years resolution of reaching a goal weight but not sure that I can with it being so inconsistent. Called customer service and was told how to recalibrate it, but again, inconsistencies. For that reason I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had these scales for 1 year since i put them in use on Dec 25th 2018. at first they worked great. They are accurate to the pound with the doctor scales. two weeks ago they started going crazy with weight going up and down. i assumed that the batteries need changing so I replaced the four batteries and re-calibrated as directed they will not come on. these scales fit perfectly on a tile in my bathroom so not on uneven surface. i am so disappointed that they did not last longer than year. will not buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: L. McElwain

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother buying
customer_reviews.text: I put the batteries that were included & it read “Lo”. I put in fresh batteries & it still read “Lo” so basically this scale is useless & defective. Also this is NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.author: N. Cedillo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, so far! Love that this scale has NO glass !!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this scale, and so far it has shown pretty consistent weight readings after initial calibration and use on a hard, flat surface. I spent time researching to find a scale that seemingly has NO glass. A glass scale is dangerous, especially for children in the home, because the scales can break and shatter. This scale is plastic, with some metal — NO glass, AND the scale looks relatively sleek. The black plastic with chrome(-ish) borders and a clear plastic display are excellent and rare nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bathroom scale to replace one we've had for years. This one had good ratings and the features I was looking for. I'm not into really high-tech gadgets, and this scale looked easy to use. The display is large enough to see well and is back-lit, so it shows up easily. So far, I've been pleased with it. It seems to be very accurate. and I like the fairly large platform to stand on. It's lightweight but seems to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: SwissMiss

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought some weights to use for exercising and I used them to measure the accuracy of the scale. Every time I placed the heavy weights on the scale it would show a different measurement. Most was an overage of weight of a half to whole pound. Suffice to say, I got a refund for the scale and disposed of it.
customer_reviews.author: CarolJ15455

customer_reviews.title: Short Lifetime
customer_reviews.text: When the scale that I purchased stopped working, it was replaced, graciously, by Lifetime Brands . Unfortunately, however, the replacement scale lasted for only 8 months before it, too, stopped working. Since I was advised that it is outside the warranty period and would not be replaced, I will be purchasing a scale from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn K.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculous. The sale worked for one week. I attempted to return the item within the designated time period, but this item seems to be non-returnable or otherwise "not eligible for return." We changed the batteries more than twice. The scale would not light up blue or show any numerical values whatsoever. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised: accurate.
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised - consistent and easy to read. I'm pleased with it as I weight 5x/week on average. The instructions recommend placing the scale where it will not be moved often. This means it has to stay in the same place unless you want to recalibrate it each time it is moved. Recalibration is not a big deal and it is something to know about the scale's design.
customer_reviews.author: Merle McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome life expectancy - 10 years
customer_reviews.text: When the contact points on the battery ends couldn't be revived, I reordered the same scales on Amazon. Imagine my surprise when I realized we'd had the same scales for 10 years! The scales are accurate to within 3 lbs of doctor's office. Easy to read with big digital numbers, easy to move. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Erma

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I decided to replace my old inaccurate scale with this one after reading the reviews. I haven't had it for a long time yet, but I am very pleased with the result. The "step-on" technology that does away with the need to press a button or tap the scale to turn it on is convenient, but I wouldn't have bought it just for that. This scale is giving me very consistent readings, which is all that I need. I don't need the extra features like bone density estimates from more expensive scales. I am very comfortable in recommending this as a simple and reliable scale for tracking weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Curl

customer_reviews.title: Best Reasonably Price Scale I've Found.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third digital scale. With the previous two I had accuracy issues and problems with consistency when the temperature changed in the house. The Eat Smart Precision I'd accurate to within a pound with my doctor's balance beam scale and doesn't appear to be inconcistent when the temperature changes. So far I'm a fan of this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the scale and called the customer service number and spoke with a representative there. He asked a few questions and immediately determined there was an issue that could not be corrected and started the replacement process. We have received the new scale without any additional cost and it works flawlessly. "Thumbs up to the entire experience!" Thanks EatSmart!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very accuate, easy to read display
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 16 year old scale with this one. I tested my old scale against doctor's scales many times and found it to be within .4 lbs repeatedly. So I tested this one out by weighing side-by-side with the old scale for about a week and they came within .1 lbs every time. I'm very happy with this scale. The display is big and bright and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: No issues with irregular weighing like so many others have
customer_reviews.text: No issues with irregular weighing like so many others have. I bought this because it doesn't has a glass top. While those others are beautiful, I didn't want to trust that it wouldn't arrive broken or that I wouldn't accidentally shatter it in regular use. I found a spot where it never has to be moved, and the accuracy appears to be spot on. I, obviously, can't be certain since I don't have another scale for comparisons, but getting on and off gives the same results, so I trust it. Glad I made this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn F

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, accurate, just what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a scale to replace a cheaper one that never was accurate. With your old one if I weighed myself two or three times in a row, I get a slightly different result every time. A few days ago I weighed myself five times in a row, and got weight between 204 pounds and 195! That’s when I decided to order a better one. This one is very accurate gives the same reading even if I tried five times a row. So far I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Salgud

customer_reviews.title: trying to shed pounds and pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: It is nice looking, light and thin, but strong. I tried it about ten times to get the most accurate weight I would and there was a 8 lbs difference ( KEEP IN MIND I AM LARGE AND WEIGHT WILL CHANGE WITH SLIGHT LEANING ESPECIALLY FOR BIG PEOPLE). But I got the same weight 3 times overall It was very close most of the time, each time i tried. My 3 year old tried it twice and came to the same weight each time and the scale found the weight much faster. Overall pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: samantha zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Consistent,  accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I received this scale a little over 2 weeks ago. I tested for consistency: 8 of 10 readings were exactly the same, the other two were off by only 0.2 lb. I also check the scale with objects of knows weight (a set of dumbbells), and against a postage scale for packages. The readings were accurate. Consequently, I've been using the scale with confidence. Setup was simple and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Arden

customer_reviews.title: Amazing BR Scale!! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Bathroom Scale. You won't be disappointed. I love that it is so thin that when you step on it it feels like you are just standing on the floor. Our other scale died after many years of use. I researched the 10 best BR scales and seen this one had the best reviews. Keep it on the floor at all times. If you stand it up when not in use, it will have to re calibrate every-time. We have a Ceramic Tile BR floor and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Marie

customer_reviews.title: I looked high and low for a scale that didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked high and low for a scale that didn't have a glass face, until I found this one. I wasn't willing to risk having it break and stab me in the foot. The measurements from this scale have been a bit variable. It seems that the first time I stand on the scale I am a few pounds heavier than the second time I stand on the scale after letting it turn off and reset. Although, it does seem that the measurements are consistent after the first weigh in. Not sure why this happens, but I don't really mind just doing it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn0005

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This scale doesn't work properly. It either doesn't turn on when it's stepped on, or it gives out different numbers each time it is stepped on. I owned this exact scale in the past and it lasted me three years without an issue, but was damaged during a recent move which led me to repurchase it. Needless to say, I am incredibly disappointed this time around. Luckily, I am in the return window still and will be sending this back. Not sure if I'll order a replacement or not. If this review was for the last EatSmart Precision Premium Digital Bathroom Scale I owned, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend - but I'm not so sure this time around ...
customer_reviews.author: AKR3

customer_reviews.title: Gave inconsistent results, Died after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This scale is stylish looking and fit into the decor of our bathroom, however it seemed to provide inconsistent results even when weighing within minutes apart from each other. I used it for about a year in which case the screen stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Lay P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Consistent Readings
customer_reviews.text: This scale is awesome. My old Salter analog flew down the stairs while I was moving and exploded so I took a chance on this new digital and I'm shocked by how consistent it is. I got on and off it a dozen times and it read the exact same weight every time. Then I picked up a bottle of soda and it increased my weight by one pound. I'm not sure how accurate it is yet, as in is the weight correct, but it is definitely consistent.
customer_reviews.author: ELH

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fast, Consistent
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy at first reading some reviews but I have had no issues. As my title says, It was easy to set up, put in batteries, put it on the ground, done. Reads weight within 2 seconds. And to the best of my knowledge, It has been accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Helin

customer_reviews.title: A precise low-profile beautiful scale!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this scale on which I can weigh with such precision! I set it up with ease, got on it to set my original weight, and then got on and off for several more times in 6 hours. My weight was always exactly the same which matches what I just weighed in my doctor's office. A beautiful scale, fast shipping, with strong packaging. If anything happens to cause this scale to perform less well over time, I will come back to the review and update it here.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGal

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had a spring loaded, dial scale for years. It never gave an accurate reading (step on it three times, get three different results). Plus, that teeny-weeny dial was just about impossible to read. Well, I got sick of it, so I did some research on digital scales and found that the EatSmart Precision Premium digital scale was accurate and easy to read. I bought it, and it works like a charm. The display is huge, easy enough for people with average vision to see without squinting, and as for accuracy, it matches the weight shown at the doctor's office. It's super easy to set up and calibrate, and it does what it's supposed to do. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: I'm owed a refund, what a lie..
customer_reviews.text: It's broken, got a little water on it and it went down about 1 month after purchasing it. It seems they've changed the description of the merchandise; when I bought it, it was detailed as waterproof..
customer_reviews.author: Dial X

customer_reviews.title: good purchase - great deal - haven't gotten to compare ...
customer_reviews.text: good purchase - great deal - haven't gotten to compare directly side by side to a high accuracy scale - but this thing is always within the 5 lb mark at my doctors office. When used the morning of my annual check up (afternoon with out meals in between) the doctors weight scale came back 3 lb heavier. Hope this helps those accuracy folks out there
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I love the large, brightly lit, easy to read numbers. I can read the results on this one just fine even without my glasses. Gone is the old tap and wait routine like my previous scales required. I just step on this one, stand for a few seconds, and then the scale flashes the correct weight. Comparing this scale's readings to the one at my doctor's office, it seems quite accurate. Just remember that like all digital scales, it needs to be placed on a hard, flat surface and not be moved around.
customer_reviews.author: Bamasue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scale--fast and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Taylor scale that took forever to get a reading on and if I got on the scale three times it would "magically" give me a reading 2-3 pounds lower than the first two, so I figured it was time to get something new. I can't say how much I LOVE this scale! I step on and it literally takes about two seconds to get a reading and then it flashes once the reading is "official." Also, the numbers are very accurate--it is consistently the correct weight as compared to the three readings of my other scale. The display is very easy to read and the scale is very low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope D.

customer_reviews.title: Get Real-Get Healthy.  Accuracy, Ease, and Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Although I hate to say a scale is my favorite thing, I do need accuracy and ease. I love this scale even though I had gained a few pounds-darn it ! No more jiggling the scale to get a better number, no more not being able to really see the numbers and no more lying to myself...Once a week, I will weigh myself and that's that !
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Samples

customer_reviews.title: does not weigh everything
customer_reviews.text: the product does weigh a body correctly. However, I also weigh my laundry to approximate the cost. The scale will not weigh the laundry which is generally around 10-13 lbs. I have to use my old scales for that which is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this scale!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale because I started a new weight-loss program and I wanted an accurate scale that I could depend on. After reading through too many reviews, I decided on this scale mainly because the company stands behind their products. I LOVE THIS SCALE!!! It's even better than I had hoped for. Accuracy is dead on and my husband, my two children, and I all tested it out numerous times, always the same readings. It's nice and sleek in appearance, very easy to read, and also easy to set up. I have recommended it to several friends since it arrived. Thanks EatSmart!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clipped Feather

customer_reviews.title: Slim design, consistent numbers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old glass WW scale that would give me a different number every time, even stepping on it multiple times in a row. The EatSmart scale is on target if I step on and off a few times and I am getting more consistent readings day to day. I have even recommended it to a co-worker already, it's half the height of my old one and lighter too. Excellent product so far and at a great price. Hopefully I don't have to use the warranty, but I don't think it would be an issue based on many of the reviews here. The company stands behind their product, rare these days.
customer_reviews.author: silentsnow

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the digital display. -Bright blue -Large digits Great features. -Stand on it and stay still for a few seconds. -Your weight will blink and it will stay at that number, even when you get off. This is good because sometimes you need to take a step back to see your weight. -Auto on/off features (detects you standing on it) EASY set up! -Put in batteries (included) -Place on hard surface -It zeros automatically Bonus -I didnt know it included a body measuring tape, which is pretty neat! **After I bought one, now I am buying one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhawk

customer_reviews.title: The best scale that I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This scale not only looks good, it is also very accurate and easy to use and set up. I have had all kinds of scales through the years where you have to tap it before you get on or it gives you way too much information. This is very simple...you get on and you get the weight. The numbers are also big so it is easy to see. I am 41 and my sight is not as good as it used to be....theses numbers are clear and big. I also love the look of the scale, thin and modern. This one is a no brainer...great purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what I can add...
customer_reviews.text: In my 12 years of shopping on Amazon.com I haven't really seen another product more positively reviewed than this one...so not sure what I can add. This scale looks very sleek (and futuristic) and works very well. As with all digital scales if you move it from one place to another, you may need to weigh yourself a couple times for the device to synch properly, not an issue if you leave it in the same place at all times. So sometimes you may find yourself to be lighter than you really are if you just moved or slided the scale. Aside from that, for the price I don't think you can find a better scale...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed, attractive, very slim Eatsmart scale - this is what I have been looking for!  It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: My former scale was silver colored. I always weigh myself naked in the morning. The former scale had marks where my feet where that wouldn't clean off and just looked old and scuzzy. This nice sleek black scale is so attractive and the best part is that you don't have to tap it first to activate and wake it up, just stand on it and it starts working. So glad I upgraded to this. Thanks Eatsmart!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sexy, just as promised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It is thin, sleek and sexy, and works as advertised! - Uses normal batteries, making it easy to find replacements as opposed to requiring expensive and hard to find batteries. - Just step on it! No tapping to turn it on! (Disclaimer: if you move this scale around, you need to do just that: tap on it and let it turn itself off. That is how it calibrates itself. However, once you leave it on the same spot, you can just hop on at any time!) - Accurate and its results are highly reproducible - Excellent customer care support! All in all, its an excellent deal for an excellent product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: R. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scale
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful scale at an amazing price. It weighs consistently, and seems to be accurate, as my husband weighed at our doctor's office the day before delivery of the scale. The instructions were easy to follow, the batteries included (!), and in a minute or two it was ready to go. We are very grateful to have been able to buy this wonderful product at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Labovitz

customer_reviews.title: This scale is practically perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: This scale is practically perfect in every way. The only drawbacks I have found are that it moves along the floor pretty easily if I nudge it with my toe, and that it underestimates weight by one pound compared to my doctors scale and the triple beam balance at the gym. I like that if I take off a shirt and get back on the scale it actually shows the difference instead of trying to guess my weight based on previous measurements like other scales do to feign consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Malon

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this scale You'll be happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice slim design works great for my small bathroom so I can easily store it when not in use. You just need to calibrate it once you have moved it by stepping on it to register a weight then stepping off and wait for the readout to turn off and then step on it to get your true weight. My wife had weighed in at Weight Wachers the same day the scale arrived and found that the scale was 2 lbs lower. she was in her PJs so I suggested she hold her clothes and try weighing herself again. The clothes added up to be 2 lbs so the scale compaired to the Weight Wachers scale.
customer_reviews.author: Martok

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Accurate AND Arrived way early !!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought because eat smart scales were consistently rated highest online by all sites that carried this brand. It is good looking and not glass. (My last was other brand and was glass. We keep in pantry - a can fell on it and gave a radiating web of cracks...) Loved the all silver extra wide, but couldn't live with cutesy little logo - embarrassing... All top ratings were correct. My two daughters and I had just been to doc and scales were spot on. It is beautiful, and perfect. Thank you Eat Smart - also arrived 3 days earlier than scheduled, nice!
customer_reviews.author: GleeBee———————————

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 8 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for about 8 months. Then, even with new batteries, it gave widely different results, e.g., 228 and 104.
customer_reviews.author: Judie

customer_reviews.title: Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this scale is necessarily accurate, as I haven't compared it to one that I KNOW is right, but it is incredibly consistent. My old Healthometer was all over the place...I had to step on it a whole bunch of times and take averages to get in the ballpark. This scale is within 2 tenths every time. I guess it doesn't matter if it is a pound off here or there for me, since I am using it more to track my patterns and less for the actual number. For my purposes, this scale is terrific! Now I just need to retrain myself to only step on it once! No need wasting all of that time. :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: great scale
customer_reviews.text: Have had the scale for about 1 month and i am extremely satisfied. It is very accurate. When I pick up known weights and weigh myself the reading changes to match the weight. It is low profile and seems to be well built. It is very easy to read and your weight reading locks in quickly. I would definitly recommend it to family and friends. How it holds up only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Rolf H. Beyer

customer_reviews.title: and a year later its dead
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this scale for about a year now. When I first got it, it was a great scale. A few months in I started having an occasional problem with it shutting off a few seconds after a stepped on it. I figured it was weak batteries and would have to change them out quite frequently. Now its turning off even when brand new batteries are installed. I guess I received a dud and since my purchase Ive also invested in a battery tester and all the aaa batteries I take out of the scale are full power. I will be buying the better one on amazon, hopefully with better results.
customer_reviews.author: KingAndy

customer_reviews.title: Precise and Acurate!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale 1 month ago after reading so many negative reviews. I tend to not believe positive reviews. However, on hardwood floor, this thing works like a magic. It gave very similar reading to my doctor's scale. I do not think this scale "remember" last reading like some reviewers said. For example, after I weighed my self, I took my wallet and keys out, I weighed then 6 oz less. Of course, I don't think negative reviewers were lying. Nothing is 100%. If yours does not work well. I think an exchange should solve the problem. The price is good for the money!
customer_reviews.author: BigBrownBear

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and looks great also
customer_reviews.text: Good scale for the price. Digital readout is easy to read. Sleek flat surface makes it look nice also. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd scale I bought. First I got a Taylor digital version that always weighed heavier than what the doctors office scale said. Then I got an analog scale, and it always said I was lighter and where I stood on the scale changed the readout. This EatSmart scale agrees with the doctors scale. If I move it to a different tile on my floor or across 2 tiles the leveling does change and the value is slightly different even after calibration - it changes by .2-.4lbs. If I leave it in the same location the measurement is consistently the same. So its the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklineK

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: It was time to replace my old digital scale. I wanted a scale that weighs in .2 pound increments, which my old scale did not do. The EatSmart Precision Premium scale is like... out of the future. It is SO thin and sleek. It stands barely over 1/2 inch in height, so cool. At first it seems strange, because you don't feel you are "stepping" onto the scale. It's barely there. The cool blue LED display is large, easy to read and different from boring red or green numerals. I would recommend this scale to my best friend, without a doubt! I really do love it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Mom was looking for a new digital scale, so I boot up Google and enter the A that brings me to Amazon almost daily!! Here I find this scale and lo and behold it was just what the doc ordered..... Two days later we are installing the battery's and Here we go........ It was simple to set up and it works flawlessly .... Best thing about this product is momma happy!!.. It arrived quicker then I thought, and it was simple to set up , works great what more can I say. I highly recommend it to anyone that has a wife that says honey,, order me a digital scale...!!!!! Howard Young
customer_reviews.author: hly387

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with This Scale
customer_reviews.text: I needed a scale that could be read easier than the one I had. The EatSmart Precision bathroom scale works as described. It shows the correct weight, I believe, rather than the last weight if reweighing within a short time, as some reviewers claimed for another model. The backlit numbers are easy to read. The size and layout for the feet are large enough for an adult man. I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Iotacnc

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 2
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews of this, I bought one and was very, very happy with it. The scale seemed to be very reliable and consistent. Unfortunately, my cat peed on it after about 3 weeks and destroyed it. I immediately bought another one, but oddly enough, this 2nd one does not seem quite as consistent as the first. Still, though, it seems pretty good. 3/13: Just thought I'd add that back in August our house flooded from Hurricane Isaac. I'd put the scale up in the laundry where the cats were, and dang if they didn't push it out the other side and into the water.
customer_reviews.author: lzrd

customer_reviews.title: we like that it is not all glass like many out ...
customer_reviews.text: works well. we like that it is not all glass like many out there (as we have small children). Had this same scale for ~5years that finally quit working and so got this same one as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: EJA

customer_reviews.title: Great accurate scale...
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this scale for five years and it just went out on me. I've changed the batteries twice in that time. This is a highly accurate scale and very consistent. I've been happy with it all this time.
customer_reviews.author: Tea&BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scale
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact same scale almost 10 years ago and was glad to see that it is still available. After years of use and moving several times it had finally gotten worn cosmetically and the feet on the bottom of the scale were coming apart. Still worked great but I felt it was time to replace. Very accurate. Large digital screen is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Tbone4tigers

customer_reviews.title: Great scale, works well
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a few days ago, but it arrived promptly, and it works perfectly! I selected it because it was one of the top-rated scales; used AAA batteries instead of the small button batteries that are so hard to find; has a large, bright display that displays to 0.1 pound; reviewers mentioned excellent customer service from the company; and this one is aluminum so I don't anticipate the problems some people mentioned of glass shattering. The one thing that surprised me is that it is larger than my old scale so it takes up more space in my tiny bathroom. But all in all, we are happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: karen thomas

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The thing to remember about this scale is not to move it once you have it set. I printed out labels with my label maker once I bought it so my family understands not to move it. On the front, I put: DO NOT MOVE* On the back, with a *, I put the instructions for recalibrating the scale if someone does move it. BTW, recalibrating is easy. I like the how the scale turns on when someone steps on it and the display is bright. The scale turns off quickly, too, which saves batteries and embarrassment. :) I would buy this again or recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Icemom

customer_reviews.title: Best scale I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this scale for over 6 years and continue to be impressed. I thought it would be worthwhile to post this review after years of complete satisfaction. I have changed the batteries once during this time and use it daily. I wish everything I owned was this simple and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Pete W

customer_reviews.title: Accurate. Easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: Tested this scale’s accuracy with an Ohio barbell which weighs a known value of 44.2 pounds, this scale hit the mark exactly, 44.2 every time. Consistent measurements time after time, be sure to use on a hard surface, tile or hardwood. Easy to read the display, large numbers, just step on and get your reading.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Dead Batteries
customer_reviews.text: My Amazon order of the Eat Smart Digital Bathroom Scale arrived today.When I installed the included batteries the scale indicated "LO" on the display.I understand these are "trial batteries" but believe they should at least work for a while.I replaced the batteries and the scale seems to work now. I am satisfied with the scale but am writing to let you know of possible problem with battery supplier.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bethel

customer_reviews.title: First day of use, but they seem as good as I'd hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my EatSmart scales with two-day free shipping. Packaged well, with scales in an inner box with 4 AAA batteries as promised. My previous scales weighed 4 - 6 lb less than the doctor's (good for morale, but not when you know your home weight is incorrect ...). The EatSmart scales are right in line with the correct weight -- will compare them on my next MD visit, but I'm sure it's close. Very lightweight, low to the floor, and attractive design.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kerr

customer_reviews.title: This is the simple accurate non-glass scale you have been looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent low cost accurate scale without all the crazy frills. If you are looking for a good accurate scale that works without trouble & doesn't have glass on it, then this is what you want. Works perfectly and simply. Excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: I have had another digital scale for over 10 years now, but lately, I started getting some inconsistent readings and I was just tired of calculating and guessing. I purchased this EatSmart Precision Premium scale to replace my old scale, and I am very happy with it. I keep it stored on the carpet so I have to move it to a hard surface every time I need to weigh myself. However, it is easy to recalibrate each time you move it. Very consistent measurements, and it shows the slightest of changes in body weight, such as before and after you go to the potty. Love the blue backlight.
customer_reviews.author: CERIZONA

customer_reviews.title: First Scale
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a scale, never wanted one, but have been told recently that I should weight myself everyday, so I looked around,and found the EatSmart Precision Premium Digital Bathroom Scale. Right out of the box, the scale is spectacular; it's not too big, and my bathroom door rolls right over it, no probs. It comes with a 100% guarantee customer service card (you can't beat that). It's fairly new, but I feel at ease knowing that if I have a problem with the product, the company has guaranteed to help me out (can't beat that) Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: T.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and function
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value and it works well. I've had it for about two months now, and use it a few times a week. It is very accurate to tenths of a pound, and has produced repeatable measurements with consistency. As a nice extra, they include a waist tape measure with the scale to help you meet your fitness goals. The function of the scale is easy. you don't have to turn it on by tapping it. You simply step onto it, and it powers up with your weight displayed. The first time you put the batteries in it, it does the zero calibration.
customer_reviews.author: Fleetside Garage

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome scale
customer_reviews.text: I've used the large dial mechanical scale for years. Recently I found it was off by about 4 pounds. I decided it was time to replace this very nice inaccurate scale with something I could trust. I read the reviews of many scales and was originally looking at the balance scales. There are some very nice well rated scales which seemed to be expensive, then I found the EatSmart Scale. I wasn't sure about a digital as I've had problems in the past with the technology (maybe 20 years ago). Well, let me say, this scale is awesome. Accurate, lightweight, good looking and inexpensive. Buy this scale, you will not be disappointed. Five Stars!
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale from EatSmart on Amazon. The scale came quickly and works wonderfully. I had read the other comments about the scale being sensitive on uneven ground ... I put the scale on my bathroom floor and it works great. I love that the screen lights up so I can read the number better : EatSmart even included a nifty little measuring tape to measure your waist, etc. The measuring tape can be pulled out to the desired length and then clipped back into the tape housing, thus making a "hands-free" circle around your mid-section!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: EatSmart Bathroom Scale
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale about 4 weeks ago. Before buying, I read many of the reviews about it on this site. The scale works great. It is repeatable, and accurate (checked with my medical beam scale). The digits are very easy to read; especially with the blue background. Because I wear bifocals, I cannot easily read the digits of any flat floor scale when I am standing on it; therefore the retention of the reading for several seconds after stepping off is a godsend. I also like the fact that it uses conventional, easy to find batteries. All in all, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good scale!
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a scale? It's black and I guess fairly stylish, but I bought it primarily because it uses 4 AAA batteries so I can use my rechargable ones. The other scale I have uses the thin "watch type" batteries and they tended to go dead after only a few uses, which proved to be more frustrating than my weigh ins. It does seem to be super accurate and very lightweight, unlike me. The display is well lit and very easy to read, much to my dismay, but hey, I did get it with the intention of losing weight... Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: CBR

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, reliable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've used this scale for several weeks and I'm very pleased with it. It's been consistently accurate. Not having to zero it every time is a nice plus. The display is large, bright and easy to read, and locks in and stays on long enough to read. I have no problem with recommending this scale. Update: one year later, and the scale is still as accurate as the first day. No problems whatsoever. Another update: three and a half years later, it's still perfectly accurate! Never a problem. I can't recommend this scale enough!
customer_reviews.author: Larry In Billerica

customer_reviews.title: Very consistent
customer_reviews.text: Very consistent readings. I like the plastic (not glass) surface. This scale appears to be a copy of an Omega brand scale that Omega no longer seems to be making. I had the Omega scale for more than 20 years before it just stop working. Highly recommend this scale from EatSmart.
customer_reviews.author: 2YsUR

customer_reviews.title: Best Scale I've Used
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this scale for about a month, and find it to be user friendly (big lit numbers), and accurate -- regardless of temperature. When I decided to replace my previous LCD scale that never performed properly (was always 4 pounds heavy and an additional pound or so was added when the room was cold), I looked at reviews here on Amazon, and chose to go with this one, and am very happy with it. The weight matches my doctors scale.
customer_reviews.author: Goldrush

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: very inaccurate, didn't have it even a year and is already constantly giving different numbers. I weigh every morning around the same time. not sure what is wrong with it but would expect it to have lasted longer, do not buy! EatSmart does not stand by their products! I have tried to contact them many times over the 1st year of having this that I just gave up and tossed it in the garbage.. which is all this is, pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Suwarato

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to!
customer_reviews.text: Almost too hard to get used to stepping on the scale twice to get an accurate weight. I'm tempted to go back to my old "one tap" scale. Slowly but surely, I'm getting used to this scale. It's just that getting on the scale twice takes a little more time on the mornings I'm in a hurry.Don't know how to discuss my dissatisfaction with this scale. I'd rather have one that registers my weight with ONE tap, not twice!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANON

customer_reviews.title: Accurate scale, great company
customer_reviews.text: We've had our new EatSmart Precision Premium Digital Bathroom Scale for about a month now. It's attractive, slim and lightweight and most of all extremely accurate. I attend Weight Watchers, and the Eatsmart scale is always in sync with WW. Most of all, I appreciate the customer care the company gives. I received an email after purchase with helpful info, and the number to call if I had any concerns. This is a small business that actually cares about its customers. A rarity these days. I would recommend the scale and the company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: lfs

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much I bought a second scale for myself
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a division one college athlete and an ocean life guard during the summer. With her training and work in the sun it is very easy for her to drop a lot of weight in a very short period of time. An accurate scale is an essential piece of equiment for her to keep her training on track. I purchased our first EatSmart scale for her after reading the reviews on Amazon. I was so pleased with the accuracy and the value that I purchased a second scale for my use. My scale will replace an old balance beam scale that is just taking up too much room in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: The decimal readout is very nice
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this because it turns on immediately I stand on it so I don't have to "press it on" with my toe - which is difficult for me because I am disabled and unable to stand on one foot. The more I use it the more I like it. It is thinner so I don't have to step up as "high." Also a special consideration for me to balance on one foot. And the readout is bright and large and easy to read. At first I didn't like the decimal readout but now I find it encouraging to lose portions of pounds.
customer_reviews.author: L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It can be off by 3 or 4 lbs. You have to repeat your measurements. I'd rather use one of those analog scales. It is hard to find an easy to use scale not made out of glass though.
customer_reviews.author: threeam

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a scale that is accurate!!!  (time after time after time)
customer_reviews.text: Many good comments precede my few words of praise; suffice it to say this scale is the BEST OF ALL! Remember, when you first use the scale, that initial weighing will be wrong. Why? The scale has to calibrate itself every time it is moved. Step off, let it switch off, then weigh yourself twice more. That final weight will be accurate and your scale will be calibrated. If you have to move it around, just recalibrate it again. Step on. wait for weight. Let it shut down. Weight twice again. Done!
customer_reviews.author: E. Christina Dabis

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: The scale is very stylish and trim in the bathroom. Easy to use, without all the junk you don't need. Plus, you just step on and don't have to look down until you are ready to read- flashes and "locks" the number. Most importantly, appears to be consistent. If you weigh yourself on 5 different scales, you'll probably get 5 different weights. What I don't like is getting 5 different weights on the same scale. I've reweighed myself a few times and the results have been consistent. Nice price, trim pretty scale, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Great scale.
customer_reviews.text: Great scale, step on it once, and you have your weight. My last scale I had to step on it at least five times to get your reading. And I like that it is not glass, as so many are today, since I have grandchildren who like to step on it.
customer_reviews.author: NoChip

customer_reviews.title: The First Accurate Scale I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4 of 5 scales in the last couple of years trying to find one that didn't vary in accuracy every time I moved it. This is the first scale that I've purchased that seems to be actually doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I have had the scale for about a week and I have mixed feelings. Not sure what is my correct weight. I get off and on and it gives me different weight each time, sometimes it just blanks out. I have a old fashion scale that I been using to check the accuracy of this digital one and it is off sometimes. Stepping on and off within one minute should not give me different numbers. I am going to try it again for another week to see if I can rely on it. So far not impressed. I need a reliable scale.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: So Precise and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Our office staff is having a contest on who can lose the most weight. We purchased the scale and put it in the office kitchen. Everyone is happy with the scale, for its accuracy, measuring by pound and ounces an easily place in a spot that is out of the way but still easy for weight ins. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: This scale does exactly what I want it to do with no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: P. J.

customer_reviews.title: Accurately matches the scale at my doctor's office.
customer_reviews.text: Most accurate and easy to read of the recent scale brands I have tried. Also - takes normal, easy to find batteries. I haven't used the mobile app.
customer_reviews.author: karen peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: In was given this item as a gift years ago. I never had a problem with it, it just wore out. The pad on one of the sensors on the bottom wore thin and separated from the unit. We were so pleased with the unit that we got another one. I am sure we will enjoy this one as well as the previous one. I highly recommend this scale!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Readings are Dead ON
customer_reviews.text: I've used this item daily now for ~ 4 months. The accuracy is phenominal . I've checked against calibrated medical scales at least 6 times ( I go to a LOT of Doctors and it is always within .1 lbs. of the "official" weight recorded at the doctors office. Besides the accuracy and wide platform, I like the fact that it blinks rapidly to tell you that it is through, and holds this reading for long enough that it's easy to verify the reading before it shuts off. The only downside to this is that the batteries ( four AAA) will give out in ~ 3 months of daily use. Pretty small problem in my book.
customer_reviews.author: T. Henn

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Day 1. I literally just received this product and it is already giving me inconsistent reads. This cannot be blamed on the batteries because it's brand new. I checked the legs because I read another reviewer say that uneven legs would cause it to read incorrectly. Neither of these typical issues caused the problem; it's the scale. I shouldn't get on it with one read and step on 2 seconds later and get a different weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ticks the one box I ask of it.
customer_reviews.text: It's accurate, fast, well lit numbers you can see in the dark. Nothing else I ask of a scale.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Good Scale
customer_reviews.text: I did my research..Who knew that there could be such differing views about scales? Some were just flat out no good..some were just flat out too expensive. A scale is a scale right? I don't need something fancy just accurate and easy to use. This scale works for me. It is attractive, wide enough to feel comfortable on, and easy to use. A scale should be a no brainer, but apparently there are some that are a waste of money. I think I got my moneys worth on this one...Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Control

customer_reviews.title: Finally a REPEATABLE scale!
customer_reviews.text: Most important feature: It is Repeatable. Follow the calibration instructions (easy), and it weighs you the same amount every time. In my test I got on and off 10 times. Sometimes leaning forward on my toes, others back on my heels, and some centered. This scale read the same reading all 10 times. THIS is what you need for tracking changes in a diet and progress on same. Cant beat the low price too.
customer_reviews.author: steven warner

product_meta.title: EatSmart Precision Premium Digital Bathroom Scale with 3.5" LCD and "Step-On" Technology
product_meta.description:
Style:ESBS-03The Eat Smart Precision Premium Bathroom Scale is the ideal way to track your weight loss quickly and easily with an attractive black platform with sleek silver accents. EatSmart's proprietary step-on technology allows you to simply step onto the scale and in seconds you'll have an accurate weight to the nearest 0.2 lb (1 kg). The ultra slim profile weighs up to 400 lb (180 kg) yet is only 0.75" thick! The 4 precision load cells are engineered to the highest standards. The oversize 3" x 1.5" readout offers clear reading from a distance thanks to the bright blue backlight. Auto calibrated; auto power-off to conserve battery power. 100% EatSmart satisfaction guarantee.Please contact us for help or troubleshooting your scale.

AMAZON.COM
The EatSmart Precision Premium Digital Bathroom Scale is the ideal way to track your weight loss. This user-friendly scale features "Step-On" technology to give you quick, easy-to-understand results. Four precision sensors provide an accurate measurement each time you step onto the scale's non-slip platform. Whether you're a personal trainer or just trying to get back in shape, this EatSmart scale is an affordable solution for keeping up with weight management goals. 

 

Four Precision Sensors Ensure Accuracy
Easy to use and extremely accurate, the EatSmart Precision Premium Scale is engineered to meet the highest accuracy standards. Its four high-gauge Precision G sensors provide accurate measurements up to 400 pounds/180 kilograms. This EatSmart scale is consistently reliable and provides the motivation you need to help keep yourself on track and meet your health goals.  "Step-On" Technology Weighs Instantly
The EatSmart Precision Premium Scale's proprietary "Step-On" technology features easy-to-use activation software that gives you an accurate readout of your weight to the nearest 0.2 pound. To operate, simply step on the scale and see your reading in seconds. With EatSmart "Step-On" technology, there's no need to tap and wait for the scale to calibrate. Just lay your scale on a hard, flat surface and step on. Within seconds, you'll see your weight displayed. Once you're done, the scale activates an auto power-off feature to preserve the battery. 

 Sleek and Stylish Design
Designed to accent any interior environment, this scale features a wide, lightweight aluminum base accented with a black, non-slip plastic cover for user safety. The EatSmart scale adds a modern look to any bathroom. Its large, 3.5-inch LCD screen is illuminated by a cool blue backlight for easy viewing--even in the most dimly lit areas. 

 Customer Testimonial
"I looked at a bunch of scales. All I wanted was a scale that was easy to use and accurate. Accuracy was my major criteria. This scale matched my doctor's scale. I weigh weekly and trust it. Plus it's easy to use. Step on it and the numbers appear in large, easy-to-read font. Glad I purchased it!" -- Norma Jean Phillipp (Parma, OH) 

 "Very stylish. It's very sleek, and I like the blue digital readout. Very accurate. Best on hard floors of course, but lightweight. The numbers are big enough to read without your glasses. Very good value for the price. Very satisfied." -- CincyGreg 

 The EastSmart Precision Premium Digital Bathroom Scale is covered by a manufacturer's limited two-year warranty. 

 What's in the Box
EatSmart Precision Premium Digital Bathroom Scale, instruction manual, and four AAA batteries.
feature_bullets: Spacious Platform: 12.25" x 11.75" with only a 0.75" profile, supported by 4 precision load cells
Easy to view readout: Extra large LCD with bright blue backlight, 3" x 1.5"
High capacity: 4 high precision G sensors measure in increments of 0.2LB (1 kg), up to 400 lb (180 kg). Engineered to the highest standards
Includes: Auto off feature to conserve the 4 AAA batteries (included), low battery and overload indicators and easy to understand instruction manual

Helpful hints: Calibration is necessary for first use. After inserting batteries, place scale on non-carpeted floor, press scale to turn on and allow to turn off. Follow this tip whenever the scale has been moved. We recommend weighing yourself at the same time, wearing similar clothing for best results. Note that weights can fluctuate throughout the day.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
